/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-has-content */ import './App.css'; function App() { return (

MD SIFATUL ISLAM |

Web/Application Developer
HELLO World
I am SIFATUL . I am a web developer and love to work with React.js, Node.js and MongoDB.
I would love to be a part of your projects, learn more and grow.

); } export default App;
